name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Final moments of the performance of 'Hana ni Bore' (花に亡霊).
Stage transition with curtains closing and opening to a new set.
Performance of the song 'Deatte kara tsukiau made no ano kanji'. Omaru Polka takes the lead with others joining for harmony.
scenes.song_name: Deatte kara tsukiau made no ano kanji

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Dokki! Kou iu no ga koi na no?'. Yukihana Lamy takes the lead.
scenes.song_name: Dokki! Kou iu no ga koi na no?

subtitles.original: 氷菓を口に放り込んで風を待っていた
subtitles.english: I popped a popsicle in my mouth and waited for the breeze.

subtitles.original: 出会ってから付き合うまでのあの感じ
subtitles.english: That Feeling from When We Met Until We Started Dating

subtitles.original: 土曜日は会えることが当たり前になって
subtitles.english: Being able to see each other on Saturdays became a matter of course,

subtitles.original: 不安からのあの気持ちが消えてちょっと寂しいの
subtitles.english: The feelings that came from anxiety have faded, and I'm a little lonely.

subtitles.original: 一生分のキスの回数すぐに超えちゃうよ
subtitles.english: We'll quickly exceed a lifetime's worth of kisses.

subtitles.original: まだ少し
subtitles.english: Just a bit more,

subtitles.original: まだもっと
subtitles.english: even more,

subtitles.original: 特別でいたい
subtitles.english: I want to stay special.

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Forever.

subtitles.original: 出会ってから付き合うまでのあの感じでいよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep that feeling we had from when we met until we started dating.

subtitles.original: わかってるふりなんて100年後もいらない
subtitles.english: I won't need to pretend I understand, even 100 years from now.

subtitles.original: 二人の合図が増えたって大事なこと言おう
subtitles.english: Even if our secret signals increase, let's say the important things.

subtitles.original: 夏の日の始まりを季節が変わっても覚えてて
subtitles.english: Remember the beginning of that summer day, even as the seasons change.

subtitles.original: 月曜は会えないなら次の日はどう？って
subtitles.english: If we can't meet on Monday, how about the next day?

subtitles.original: 繰り返しの言葉だってそれがもっと言ってよね
subtitles.english: Even if it's repetitive words, please say them more.

subtitles.original: 一回だけのキスのためにすぐに会いに来た
subtitles.english: I came to see you right away just for a single kiss.

subtitles.original: あの時のあの場所は特別じゃないし
subtitles.english: That place at that time wasn't special,

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Forever.

subtitles.original: 出会ってから付き合うまでのあの感じでいよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep that feeling we had from when we met until we started dating.

subtitles.original: そっけないふりなんてかっこよくもないよ
subtitles.english: Pretending to be indifferent isn't even cool.

subtitles.original: 間違いないこと増えたって幸せちょっと違う
subtitles.english: Even as the certainties increase, happiness is a little different.

subtitles.original: 夏の日の始まりが正しい恋よほら映してる
subtitles.english: The beginning of that summer day is true love, look, it's being reflected.

subtitles.original: ずっと 出会ってから付き合うまでのあの感じでいよう
subtitles.english: Forever, let's keep that feeling we had from when we met until we started dating.

subtitles.original: わかってるふりなんて100年後もいらない
subtitles.english: I won't need to pretend I understand, even 100 years from now.

subtitles.original: 二人の合図が増えたって大事なこと言おう
subtitles.english: Even if our secret signals increase, let's say the important things.

subtitles.original: 夏の日の始まりを季節が変わっても覚えてて
subtitles.english: Remember the beginning of that summer day, even as the seasons change.

subtitles.original: ドキッ! こういうのが恋なの?
subtitles.english: Thump! Is This What Love is Like?

subtitles.original: ハイ ハイ ハイ
subtitles.english: Hi, hi, hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: ねえ 歌うわ そうよ あなたに
subtitles.english: Hey, I'll sing, yes, for you.

subtitles.original: 甘えたいけれど 恥ずかしいかもね
subtitles.english: I want to be spoiled, but it might be embarrassing.

subtitles.original: かもね
subtitles.english: Maybe.

subtitles.original: おい!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: 願い事の呪文 ほら ムニャムニャムニャ〜
subtitles.english: The spell for a wish, look, mumble mumble mumble~

subtitles.original: ハイ ハイ ハイ
subtitles.english: Hi, hi, hi!

subtitles.original: ずっとこのまま時が止まらぬかもね
subtitles.english: Time might never stop just like this.

subtitles.original: かもね
subtitles.english: Maybe.
